title: Cultivating a Consultant Mindset in Developers
description: All developers have the potential to be innovative and disruptive game changers on each project they touch. The consultant mindset — a frame of mind that embraces measured, creative, critical thinking — isn't just about projects, it can empower entire organizations.
summary: How can developers be their own consultant and positively impact the technical strategy of their organization? It's easier than you think.

children.value: All developers have the potential to be innovative and disruptive game changers on each project they touch. The consultant mindset — a frame of mind that embraces measured, creative, critical thinking — isn't just about projects, it can empower entire organizations.

In this cornerstone article featured as part of the Consultant Mindset for Developer series, I talk about how developers can adopt this mindset and become internal consultants that shape the technical trajectory to benefit their organization.
